name: Urge
description:
You find yourself in a mysterious town with a strong urge to take a leak, but peeing on the ground is not a possibility, toilets clog fast, Urge-powered vehicles eject fumes, so be careful, because when the Urge rush once comes, it is very hard to get back from it.

Main features:

  • The Urge is a condition which you have to satisfy, for example, in local toilets or plastic bottles.

  • The yellow fog shows the amount of Urge dust in the air. Which causes higher spawn of enemies (special types), they also get faster and your Urge bar fills up more quickly. The Urge dust concentration rises, for example, when you pee in a clogged toilet (on the ground), when you drive the Urge-powered dune buggy, etc.

  • Use a variety of weapons, melee weapons and throwables against horrific creatures.

  • Drive vehicles, that you find around the town.

  • Explore, search for items and use them for crafting.

  • Barricade a house and lay down traps to keep you safe for a while.
